query: WITH entities AS (SELECT customer_id, approval_process_id, id FROM core_credit_facility_proposals WHERE ((customer_id = $1) AND ((approval_process_id IS NOT DISTINCT FROM $4) AND COALESCE(id > $3, true) OR COALESCE(approval_process_id > $4, approval_process_id IS NOT NULL))) ORDER BY approval_process_id ASC NULLS FIRST, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $5 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_credit_facility_proposal_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.approval_process_id asc nulls first, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
